Other Information.Test Conditions: 1.5 M VO2+ in 3 M H2SO4, 298 K
Other Information.Additional Info: CZIF-8 effectively blocked vanadium ions while allowing proton transport.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Vanadium ion permeability reduced from 8.14 × 10^-7 to 4.23 × 10^-7 cm² min⁻¹ after introducing 3 wt% CZIF-8.

Other Information.Additional Info: Carbonized ZIF-8 retained its porous structure and exhibited excellent chemical stability under harsh acidic conditions.
